text: A health minister is the member of a country's government typically responsible for protecting and promoting public health and providing welfare and other social security services. == Country-related articles and lists == * Albania: Ministry of Health (Albania) * Australia: Minister for Health (Australia) * Austria: Minister of Health (Austria) *: Ministry of Healthcare (Azerbaijan) * Bhutan: Ministry of Health (Bhutan) * Bahamas: Ministry of Health * Barbados: Ministry of Health * Belgium: Ministry of Public Health (Belgium) * Brunei: Ministry of Health (Brunei) *
